author: "Riccardo Cappuzzo"

This online book contains the material used for the Inria Academy course on the
[skrub package](https://skrub-data.org/stable/). 

Each chapter of the book includes a theoretical section that describes a specific
aspect of the library, and one or more exercises that are intended to put into 
practice what has been explained.

Quiz sections split the major sections of the code. 


[JupyterLite](https://skrub-data.org/skrub-tutorials/jupyterlite/lab)

## Prepration and setup
The easiest way to work with the notebooks provided here is by installing and
using [pixi](https://pixi.sh/latest/installation/).

Then, it is possible to run

```sh
pixi install
```

to create the environment, followed by 

```sh
pixi shell
``` 

to create a shell that allows to run the exercises.
